assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Khandwala Securities Limited provides stock broking, investment banking, investment advisory, portfolio management, and depository participant services in India. It offers investment banking services, including capital raising, mergers and acquisitions advisory, domestic IPOs, FCCBs, private equity placements, corporate finance advisory, follow-on offerings, rights offerings, ADR and GDR offerings, QIP transactions and convertible offerings, and restructuring services. The company also provides institutional equities services, such as institutional equity sales, execution, research; and broking and distribution services comprising non-institutional equity sales, trading, research, and broking and distribution. In addition, it offers investment advisory services, including private and corporate wealth management, planning and asset deployment advice, and asset allocation and distribution of various products; and equity and debt issue management services. The company serves public and private sector corporations, multinational corporations, financial institutions, institutional investors, high net worth individuals, and retail investors, as well as market intermediaries. Khandwala Securities Limited was founded in 1934 and is based in Mumbai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Paresh Jayantilal Khandwala
companyOfficers.title: MD, Chief Investor Relations Officer & Promoter Director
